document.full_text: r&b singer rihanna has defended a controversial music video that shows her gunning down a man, saying it is a message of empowerment for girls.
document.title: rihanna says "man down" video empowers women
lines_and_colors: r&b singer rihanna has defended a controversial music video that shows her gunning down a man, saying it is a message of empowerment for girls.
